author: olegk
msg: PR #24327 (MS Proxy with NTLM authentication set up does not work)
Fixes the severe bug of HttpClient not resetting the 'force-close connection' flag, if the HTTP method is automatically retried (for instance, when automatically handling authentication challenge)

author: olegk
msg: PR #24327 (MS Proxy with NTLM authentication set up does not work)
Fixes the severe bug of HttpClient not resetting the 'force-close connection' flag, if the HTTP method is automatically retried (for instance, when automatically handling authentication challenge)

author: olegk
msg: Fixes the problem HttpClient discarding all the 'Cookie' & 'Authorization' headers including those
manually set when populating request header collection with automatically generated headers.
Reviewed by Roland Weber & Michael Becke
